meaningMnemonic: The radical <radical>fish</radical> and the kanji <kanji>fish</kanji> are exactly the same!
readingMnemonic: You catch a <kanji>fish</kanji>. As you pull it out of the water, it starts yelling and pointing: "<reading>GO</reading>!" (ぎょ). "GO GYO GYO GYO!" There's a huge cruise ship coming right towards your little fishing boat. No wonder the fish was yelling GO at you.
